project.name: CapLabs
project.description: A stablecoin engine to democratize sophiscated yield strategies
project.longDescription: CAP is a decentralized stablecoin protocol on MegaETH. Users can mint cUSD by depositing collateral and maintaining a collateral ratio.

features.title: cUSD Stablecoin
features.description: A decentralized stablecoin backed by collateral on MegaETH.

features.title: Testnet Support
features.description: Full functionality available on the MegaETH testnet.

project.currentStatus: Testnet is live with full functionality for minting cUSD.

steps.title: Access CAP Testnet
steps.content: Visit https://cap.app/testnet to access the CAP testnet interface.

steps.title: Mint cUSD
steps.content: Follow the interface to mint cUSD by depositing collateral and maintaining the required collateral ratio.
